summary: After his son is murdered by drug dealers, a snowplow driver starts seeking revenge.
cast: Stellan Skarsgård|Bruno Ganz|Pål Sverre Hagen|Jack Sødahl Moland|Arthur Berning|Stig Henrik Hoff|Sergej Trifunovic|Miodrag 'Miki' Krstovic|Goran Navojec|Jon Øigarden|Bjørn Moan|Damir Babovic|Anders Baasmo Christiansen|Atle Antonsen|Leo Ajkic|Birgitte Hjort Sørensen|Julia Bache-Wiig|John Ivar Bye|Gard B. Furuseth|Ola Døhl|Arben Bala|Matic Nebojsa|Nils-Fredrik Tveter|Andrija Knicanin|Martin Furulund|Isak Peter Brodahl
title: Uno tras otro
